channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 12:19 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 12:19 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 12:15 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 12:15 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 12:11 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🟡 12:11 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region
item.description: 🟡 12:11 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in the city Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community.
